sentence.Network_en: Pippin : I just want to look at it. Just one more time.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮平: 我只是想看看它. 一眼就行.

sentence.Network_en: Pippin is unable to sleep, and gets up, walking toward Gandalf.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮平辗转反侧,难以入睡, 于是他爬起来, 走向刚多尔夫.
皮平: 什么, 甘道夫? 看见什么?
